ValidationRule.description: Regular Users (Non-Admin/Non-Legal user) should not be allowed to edit ANY fields on a Contract if its Status is either Expired or Terminated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.LVGO_Automation_Switch__c.Validations__c, NOT( OR( $UserRole.Name = "Legal", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "Sales Ops" ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Expired") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Legal users are able to edit this record due to its Status being either "Expired" or "Terminated". If you believe you this record needs to be updated, please Chatter @Livongo Legal.
